title: Attack on Titan
desc: After his hometown is destroyed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

title: Death Note
desc: An intelligent high school student goes on a secret crusade to eliminate criminals from the world after discovering a notebook capable of killing anyone whose name is written into it.

title: One Piece
desc: Monkey D. Luffy sets off on an adventure with his pirate crew in hopes of finding the greatest treasure ever, known as the "One Piece."

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
desc: Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes awry and leaves them in damaged physical forms.

title: One Punch Man
desc: The story of Saitama, a hero that does it just for fun & can defeat his enemies with a single punch.

title: Naruto: Shippuden
desc: Naruto Uzumaki, is a loud, hyperactive, adolescent ninja who constantly searches for approval and recognition, as well as to become Hokage, who is acknowledged as the leader and strongest of all ninja in the village.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
desc: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

title: Dragon Ball Z
desc: With the help of the powerful Dragonballs, a team of fighters led by the saiyan warrior Goku defend the planet earth from extraterrestrial enemies.

title: Hunter x Hunter
desc: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness. With his friends and his potential, he seeks out his father, who left him when he was younger.

title: Cowboy Bebop
desc: The futuristic misadventures and tragedies of an easygoing bounty hunter and his partners.

title: Naruto
desc: Naruto Uzumaki, a mischievous adolescent ninja, struggles as he searches for recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the village's leader and strongest ninja.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
desc: A boy swallows a cursed talisman - the finger of a demon - and becomes cursed himself. He enters a shaman's school to be able to locate the demon's other body parts and thus exorcise himself.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
desc: A teenage boy finds himself recruited as a member of an elite team of pilots by his father.

title: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners
desc: A Street Kid trying to survive in a technology and body modification-obsessed city of the future. Having everything to lose, he chooses to stay alive by becoming an Edgerunner, a Mercenary outlaw also known as a Cyberpunk.

title: My Hero Academia
desc: A superhero-admiring boy enrolls in a prestigious hero academy and learns what it really means to be a hero, after the strongest superhero grants him his own powers.

title: Vinland Saga
desc: Following a tragedy, Thorfinn embarks on a journey with the man responsible for it to take his life in a duel as a true and honorable warrior to pay homage.

title: Code Geass
desc: After being given a mysterious power to control others, an outcast prince becomes the masked leader of the rebellion against an all-powerful empire.

title: Steins;Gate
desc: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Bleach
desc: High school student Ichigo Kurosaki, who has the ability to see ghosts, gains soul reaper powers from Rukia Kuchiki and sets out to save the world from "Hollows".

title: Dragon Ball
desc: Son Gokû, a fighter with a monkey tail, goes on a quest with an assortment of odd characters in search of the Dragon Balls, a set of crystals that can give its bearer anything they desire.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
desc: A Tokyo college student is attacked by a ghoul, a superpowered human who feeds on human flesh. He survives, but has become part ghoul and becomes a fugitive on the run.

title: Chainsaw Man
desc: Following a betrayal, a young man left for dead is reborn as a powerful devil-human hybrid after merging with his pet devil and is soon enlisted into an organization dedicated to hunting devils.

title: Erased
desc: 29-year-old Satoru Fujinuma is sent back in time 18 years to prevent the events leading to his mother's death, which began with a series of kidnappings while he was in 5th grade.

title: Berserk
desc: Guts, a wandering mercenary, joins the Band of the Hawk after being defeated in a duel by Griffith, the group's leader and founder. Together, they dominate every battle, but something menacing lurks in the shadows.

title: Samurai Champloo
desc: Fuu, a waitress who works in a teahouse, rescues two master swordsmen, Mugen and Jin, from their execution to help her find the "samurai who smells of sunflowers."

title: Sword Art Online
desc: In the year 2022, thousands of people get trapped in a new virtual MMORPG and the lone wolf player, Kirito, works to escape.

title: Parasyte: The Maxim
desc: 17-year-old Shinichi Izumi is partially infected by a Parasyte, monsters that butcher and consume humans. He must learn to co-exist with the creature if he is to survive both the life of a Parasyte and a human as part monster, part person.

title: Monster
desc: Tenma, a brilliant neurosurgeon with a promising future, risks his career to save the life of a critically wounded young boy. The boy, now a charismatic young man, reappears 9 years later in the midst of a string of unusual serial murders.

title: Mob Psycho 100
desc: A psychic middle school boy tries to live a normal life and keep his growing powers under control, even though he constantly gets into trouble.

title: The Promised Neverland
desc: When three gifted kids at an isolated idyllic orphanage discover the secret and sinister purpose they were raised for, they look for a way to escape from their evil caretaker and lead the other children in a risky escape plan.

title: Pokémon
desc: Covering the continuing adventures of series protagonist Ash Ketchum and Pikachu, and his best friend Brock, the two meet a new coordinator named Dawn, who travels with them through Sinnoh and enters Pokemon Contests.

title: Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War
desc: The peace is suddenly broken when warning sirens blare through the Soul Society. Residents are disappearing without a trace and nobody knows who's behind it. Meanwhile, a darkness is approaching Ichigo and his friends in Karakura Town.

title: Spy x Family
desc: A spy on an undercover mission gets married and adopts a child as part of his cover. His wife and daughter have secrets of their own, and all three must strive to keep together.

title: Your Lie in April
desc: A piano prodigy who lost his ability to play after suffering a traumatic event in his childhood is forced back into the spotlight by an eccentric girl with a secret of her own.

title: The Seven Deadly Sins
desc: The story of the Seven Deadly Sins, a group of warriors who were wrongly accused of a crime they didn't commit and went on a quest to vindicate themselves.

title: Haikyu!!
desc: Determined to be like the volleyball championship's star player nicknamed "the small giant", Shoyo joins his school's volleyball club.

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
desc: The story of the Joestar family, who are possessed with intense psychic strength, and the adventures each member encounters throughout their lives.

title: Black Clover
desc: Asta and Yuno were abandoned together at the same church and have been inseparable since. As children, they promised that they would compete against each other to see who would become the next Emperor Magus.

title: Dragon Ball Super
desc: Six months after the defeat of Majin Buu, the mighty Saiyan Son Goku continues his quest on becoming stronger.

title: Elfen Lied
desc: Two university students come across a seemingly harmless girl named Lucy, unaware that she's actually a mutant serial killer with a split personality.

title: Solo Leveling
desc: Follows the adventures of Sung Jinwoo in a world that is constantly threatened by monsters and evil forces. In his battles Sung transforms himself from the weakest hunter of all mankind to one of the strongest hunters in existence.

title: Violet Evergarden
desc: In the aftermath of a great war, Violet Evergarden, a young female ex-soldier, gets a job at a writers' agency and goes on assignments to create letters that can connect people.

title: Akame ga Kill!
desc: A countryside boy named Tatsumi sets out on a journey to The Capital to make a name for himself and met a seemingly dangerous group of Assassins known as Night Raid. Their journey begins.

title: Dr. Stone
desc: High schooler Taiju awakens from petrification millennia after a blinding light turned humanity to stone. He finds his scientific genius friend Senku working on a plan to rebuild civilization using science.

title: Devilman: Crybaby
desc: With demons reawakened and humanity in turmoil, a sensitive demon-boy is led into a brutal, degenerate war against evil by his mysterious friend, Ryo.

title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
desc: Son of Naruto Uzumaki, Boruto, follows his father's footsteps along with his friends to become great ninja. Throughout all their adventures, Boruto is determined to make his mark in the ninja world and live outside of his father's shadow.

title: Fairy Tail
desc: Lucy, an aspiring Celestial Wizard, becomes a friend and ally to powerful wizards Natsu, Gray, and Erza, who are part of the (in)famous wizard guild, Fairy Tail.

title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World
desc: After being suddenly transported to another world, Subaru Natsuki and his new female partner are brutally murdered. However, Subaru awakens to a familiar scene, meeting the same girl again. The day begins to mysteriously repeat itself.

title: Hellsing Ultimate
desc: The vampire Alucard, his master Sir Integra Fairbrook Wingates Hellsing, and his newly sired ward Seras Victoria, try to protect England from a war-crazed SS-Major who seeks to start an eternal war with his vampire army.

title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
desc: Elf mage Frieren and her fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. But Frieren will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to understand what life means to the people around her?

title: Tokyo Revengers
desc: Hanagaki Takemichi lives an unsatisfying life right up until his death. Waking up 12 years in the past, he reckons with the eventual fate of his friends and tries to prevent an unfortunate future.

title: Dragon Ball Z Kai
desc: Goku is settled with his family and is living in peace. Unfortunately, his peaceful time is momentary as a visitor crashes into the planet claiming to be his brother.

title: Star Wars: Visions
desc: An anthology of animated shorts from around the world celebrating the mythology of Star Wars through unique cultural perspectives.

title: Trigun
desc: Vash the Stampede is the most infamous outlaw on the planet Gunsmoke and with a 60 billion double dollar price on his head the most sought after.

title: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation
desc: A 34-year-old underachiever gets run over by a bus, but his story isn't over. Reincarnated as an infant, he'll embark on an epic adventure.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
desc: Yugi Moto solves an Ancient Egyptian Puzzle and brings forth a dark and powerful alter ego. Whenever he and his friends are threatened by evil in Duel Monster Card Game, this alter ego breaks out to save them.

title: Digimon: Digital Monsters
desc: A group of young teens is unexpectedly sent to the mysterious Digital World and paired up with their own powerful, morphing monster called the Digimon. Together the entire group set out on an adventure to fight evil and save the world.

title: Psycho-Pass
desc: Believing in humanity and order, policewoman Akane Tsunemori obeys the ruling, computerized, precognitive Sibyl System. But when she faces a criminal mastermind who can elude this perfect system, she questions both Sibyl and herself.

title: Assasination Classroom
desc: A powerful creature claims that within a year, Earth will be destroyed by him, but he offers mankind a chance by becoming a homeroom teacher where he teaches his students about how to kill him. An assassination classroom begins.

title: Dororo
desc: Sightless Hyakkimaru wields fearsome prosthetics in place of the limbs his father traded to 12 demons. When he encounters the young thief Dororo, the pair sets out to reclaim Hyakkimaru's body parts and survive the demon-infested world.

title: Kaguya-sama: Love is War
desc: The proudly privileged top two students of an elite school each makes it their mission to be the first to extract a confession of love from the other.

title: Gurren Lagann
desc: Two friends, Simon and Kamina, become the symbols of rebellion against the powerful Spiral King, who forced mankind into subterranean villages.

title: Death Parade
desc: After death, humans go to either heaven or hell. But for some, at the instant of their death, they arrive at the Quindecim, a bar attended by the mysterious white-haired Decim.

title: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex
desc: The futuristic adventures of a female cyborg counter intelligence agent and her support team.

title: The Future Diary
desc: A young man competes with people around the world for a chance to become the succesor of God, with a diary that is able to tell the future.

title: Rurouni Kenshin
desc: The adventures of a young wandering swordsman who stumbles upon a struggling martial arts school in Meiji era Japan.

title: FLCL
desc: Mysterious things start happening when 12-year-old Naota meets a strange woman on a Vespa wielding a big guitar.

title: Noragami
desc: A minor god seeking to gain widespread worship teams up with a human girl he saved to gain fame, recognition and at least one shrine dedicated to him.

title: Toradora!
desc: Toradora tells the tale of Ryuji (dragon) and Taiga (tiger) helping each other confess to their crushes.

title: No Game, No Life
desc: Siblings Sora and Shiro make up the most feared team of pro gamers in the world, The Blank. When they manage to beat God himself in a game of chess, they are sent to a world where all disputes are settled with games.

title: Another
desc: When Sasakibara Kouichi transfers to a new school, he can sense something frightening in the atmosphere of his new class, a secret none of them will talk about. At the center is the beautiful girl Misaki Mei.

title: Black Lagoon
desc: A Japanese businessman, captured by modern-day pirates, is written off and left for dead by his company. Tired of the corporate life, he opts to stick with the mercenaries that kidnapped him, becoming part of their gang.

title: The Rising of the Shield Hero
desc: A gamer is magically summoned into a parallel universe, where he is chosen as one of four heroes destined to save the world from its prophesied doom.

title: Serial Experiments Lain
desc: Strange things start happening when a withdrawn girl named Lain becomes obsessed with an interconnected virtual realm known as "The Wired".

title: Inuyasha
desc: A teenage girl periodically travels back in time to feudal Japan to help a young half-demon recover the shards of a jewel of great power.

title: Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai
desc: After experiencing "puberty syndrome" himself, high school pariah Sakuta keeps meeting girls suffering from it, including his sister and actor Mai.

title: Tokyo Ghoul: Root A
desc: After being tortured and transformed, Kaneki leaves Anteku and joins Aogiri tree in order to protect his friends. While he tries to get stronger, Touka decides to enroll in college while they all try to recover from Kaneki leaving.

title: KILL la KILL
desc: A young girl arrives at a school of superhumans to find out the truth behind her father's murder.

title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
desc: Average 37-year-old Minami Satoru dies and is reincarnated as the most unremarkable creature imaginable-a slime.

title: Ergo Proxy
desc: In a post-apocalyptic future humans live in peace with androids in a domed city. However, a strange series of murders has intruded into bored inspector Re-l Mayer's life.

title: Horimiya
desc: Two very different people - an academically successful schoolgirl and a quiet loser schoolboy - meet and develop a friendship.

title: Made in Abyss
desc: A girl and her robot companion search for her mother, who's lost within a vast chasm.

title: Yu Yu Hakusho: Ghost Files
desc: After a teenage delinquent is killed while saving a child's life from an approaching car, the rulers of the underworld send him back to become an "Underworld Detective" investigating demons apparitions in the human world.

title: Blue Lock
desc: High school soccer players from across Japan gather for a controversial project designed to create the best and most egoistic striker in the world.

title: Angel Beats!
desc: Rebellious teens fight in armed combat against one dispassionate girl's supernatural powers in an afterlife high school.

title: Gintama
desc: In an era where aliens have invaded and taken over feudal Tokyo, an unemployed samurai finds work however he can.

title: Hell's Paradise: Jigokuraku
desc: A squad of prisoners and their guards are sent to investigate a mysterious island. They get stranded there and must rely on each other to survive the island's mysterious and monstrous residents.

title: My Dress-Up Darling
desc: A quiet loner and the popular girl at school find common ground, making their cosplay dreams come true.

title: Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day
desc: Five childhood companions reunite when the ghost of their dead friends appears, and demands they grant her final wish.

title: Konosuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
desc: It was a happy day for Kazuma - right up to the moment he died. A goddess intervenes and offers him a second chance in a magical land.

title: Highschool of the Dead
desc: High school students are overwhelmed with the start of the zombie apocalypse.

title: Detective Conan
desc: The cases of a detective whose physical age was chemically reversed to that of a prepubescent boy but must hide his true mental development.

title: Claymore
desc: Hybrid warrior Clare and her comrades fight to protect their land from shape-shifting demons.

title: Classroom of the Elite
desc: When Kiyotaka enters government-sponsored elite high school, he finds out just how merit-based this education system is.

title: Blue Exorcist
desc: After discovering that he's the son of Satan, a young man must join the True Cross Academy in order to master his abilities and defeat Satan himself.

title: Fate/Zero
desc: Seven chosen mages and their summoned heroic spirits fight against each other to try and win the Holy Grail: a magical device that can grant any wish.

title: Clannad
desc: A high school student who cares little about school or his future decides to help a lonely girl repeating her final year in re-establishing the school's drama club.

title: Pluto
desc: When the world's seven most advanced robots and their human allies are murdered one by one, inspector Gesicht soon discovers that he's also in danger.

title: Overlord
desc: When a popular MMORPG is scheduled to be shut down permanently, veteran player Momonga refuses to log out. As NPCs begin to develop personalities and minds of their own he decides to put his skills to use as the game's new overlord.

title: Darling in the Franxx
desc: In a future world where humanity has been driven to endangerment by giant beasts, a strike force is assembled to destroy the monsters and save the world.

title: Mushi-Shi
desc: Mushi Master Ginko travels from place to place investigating occurrences that could be tied to supernatural creatures called Mushi.

title: Soul Eater
desc: Set in the Shinigami technical school, the series revolves around a partnership between a weapon meisters and a human weapons. Trying to reach a ranking of "Death Scythe" they must collect the souls of 99 evil humans and 1 witch.

title: Paranoia Agent
desc: Seemingly unconnected citizens of Tokyo are targeted for bludgeoning by a boy with a golden baseball bat. As detectives try to link the victims, they discover that following the assaults, the victims' lives have improved in some way.

title: Terror in Resonance
desc: Tokyo has been decimated by a terrorist attack, the only clue to the culprit's identity is a bizarre internet video. Two mysterious children form Sphinx, a clandestine entity determined to pull the trigger on this world.

title: High School DxD
desc: After being killed on his first date, idiotic and perverted Issei Hyodo is resurrected as a demon by Rias Gremory only to be recruited into her club of high-class devils.

title: Kakegurui
desc: A gambling prodigy comes to an elite school run by games and turns the order upside down.

title: Sailor Moon
desc: The magical action-adventures of a teenage girl who learns of her destiny as the legendary warrior Sailor Moon and must band together with the other Sailor Scouts to defend the Earth and Galaxy.

title: Kaiju No. 8
desc: A man working a job far removed from his childhood dreams gets wrapped up in an unexpected situation - Becoming a monster, he aims once again to fulfill his lifelong dream.

title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma
desc: Soma Yukihira enrolls in an elite culinary school to become a full-time chef and surpass his father's culinary skills.

title: Ranking of Kings
desc: The people of the kingdom look down on the young Prince Bojji, who can neither hear nor speak. They call him "The Useless Prince" while jeering at his supposed foolishness.

title: Beastars
desc: In a world of anthropomorphic animals, a reclusive wolf's complicated relationship with a kindly rabbit is tested by a classmate's murder, a charismatic deer's influence, and his own burgeoning predatory instincts.

title: Baccano!
desc: A crazy fantasy caper involving alchemists, immortals, gangsters, outlaws and an elixir of immortality, spread over several decades.

title: Darker Than Black
desc: In Tokyo, an impenetrable field known as "Hell's Gate" appeared ten years ago. At the same time, psychics who wield paranormal powers at the cost of their conscience also emerged.

title: Tokyo Ghoul: re
desc: It has been 2 years since the GCC raid in Anteiku. Although the environment in Tokyo has changed drastically due to the CCG's increased influence, Ghouls are still a problem, especially the Aogiri Tree organization.

title: Deadman Wonderland
desc: After being falsely convicted for the murder of his entire class, a young man must learn to survive in a mysterious prison with a perverted take on incarceration while also looking to clear his name.

title: Kuroko's Basketball
desc: Kagami meets Kuroko, the 6th member of the Miracle Generation, and they make a pact to defeat the other members of the team. A battle of light (Kagami) and shadow (Kuroko) begins.

title: Dorohedoro
desc: Amnesiac Caiman seeks to undo his lizard head curse by killing the sorcerer responsible, with his friend Nikaido's help. In the Hole, that's a threat.

title: Fire Force
desc: A superhuman firefighter force is formed to deal with supernatural fire incidents.

title: Great Teacher Onizuka
desc: About Eikichi Onizuka, a 22-year-old ex-gangster member and a virgin. He has one ambition that no one ever expected from him. His sole life purpose is to become the greatest high school teacher ever.

title: Ouran High School Host Club
desc: You'll fall for the Ouran Host Club: Tamaki's truly romantic. Kaoru and Hikaru display brotherly love, Kyoya's brainy, Honey's innocent, and Mori's manly. Oh, and don't forget Haruhi. He knows what girls want, because he's a girl too.

title: Steins;Gate 0
desc: Mad scientist Okabe struggles to recover from past failure and tests a new artificial intelligence

title: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.
desc: Saiki Kusuo is a powerful psychic who hates attracting attention, yet he is surrounded by colorful characters who always find a way to remove him from his everyday life.

title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica
desc: A creature named Kyubey offers Madoka and Sayaka a wish if they agree to become 'magical girls' and fight abstract beings called 'witches'. However, a magical girl named Homura is, for uncertain reasons, determined to stop this agreement.

title: Saint Seiya: Knights of the Zodiac
desc: A group a young warriors known as 'Saints', each in possession of a 'cloth' guarded by a different constellation, must protect the reincarnation of the goddess Athena as she attempts to keep the Earth from being destroyed by evil forces.

title: Fighting Spirit
desc: Ippo, a teenage boy with a pure heart and unrelenting determination, discovers a passion for boxing after veteran fighter Takamura saves him from bullies.

title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?
desc: A fateful encounter - what adventuring is all about. But for Bell Cranel, meeting a girl doesn't go quite as planned.

title: Goblin Slayer
desc: In a fantasy world, a lone hero makes his living by exterminating all goblins he encounters. But one day he meets a friend, and his life begins to become more intense.

title: Yuri!!! On Ice
desc: After suffering defeat, Yuri Katsuki hangs up his ice skates for good. But will an encounter with two top skaters reignite his passion?

title: Bungo Stray Dogs
desc: Follows Atsushi Nakajima as he joins the Armed Detective Agency in battling the Port Mafia and other superhuman threats to public safety.

title: Oshi No Ko
desc: A doctor and his recently-deceased patient are reborn as twins to a famous Japanese musical idol and navigate the highs and lows of the Japanese entertainment industry as they grow up together through their lives.

title: To Your Eternity
desc: A lonely boy wandering the Arctic regions of North America meets a wolf, and the two become fast friends, depending on each other to survive the harsh environment. But the boy has a history, and the wolf is more than meets the eye as well.

title: Komi Can't Communicate
desc: An elite and aloof schoolgirl is in fact severely withdrawn and anxious about communicating with others. An ordinary schoolboy befriends her and helps her to open up and talk with people.

title: Fruits Basket
desc: After Tohru is taken in by the Soma family, she learns that twelve family members transform involuntarily into animals of the Chinese zodiac and helps them deal with the emotional pain caused by the transformations.

title: Black Butler
desc: Ciel Phantomhive takes care of the many unsettling events in Victorian England. Aided by Sebastian Michaelis, his loyal butler with seemingly inhuman abilities. But is there more to this black-clad butler than meets the eye?

title: Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead
desc: A worker in a foreign finance company is bullied and worked around the clock, before a zombie outbreak finally makes him feel alive.

title: My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU
desc: About an antisocial high school student named Hikigaya Hachiman with a distorted view on life and no friends or girlfriend. His life change when he was forced to enter the "Volunteer Service Club" by his teacher.

title: Baki
desc: The protagonist, Baki Hanma, trains with an intense focus to become strong enough to surpass his father, Yujiro Hanma, the strongest fighter in the world.

title: Record of Ragnarok
desc: Every 1000 years, the Gods' Council assemble to decide the fate of humanity. After 7 million years of human history, the gods come to the decision that humans are irredeemable and must be extinct.

title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
desc: The crazy adventures of the SOS Brigade, led by the insane but charismatic Haruhi.

title: Banana Fish
desc: Ash Lynx is raised by an infamous gangster, Dino Golzine. When Ash grows up, he has his own gang and he must stop Dino from catching hold of the Banana Fish, a mysterious drug that causes insanity.

title: Maid Sama!
desc: Ayuzawa Misaki serves as the student council president at Seika High. However, unbeknownst to her classmates, she works part-time as an employee at a Maid Cafe. Usui Takumi, a boy from her school, discovers this secret.

title: Fate/stay night [Unlimited Blade Works]
desc: A group of seven magicians gets chosen to become masters of seven classes of heroic spirits, in order to fight and win the Holy Grail.

title: Mashle: Magic and Muscles
desc: Into a world of magicians is born Mash, a young boy who lacks magic but is the strongest person around. His existence and destiny will change his world.
The Republic of San Magnolia has been attacked by its neighbor, the Empire.

title: The Devil Is a Part-Timer!
desc: Hilarity and fun ensues when Satan ends up in modern day Japan without any magic to return, and starts working part time in a fast food joint.

title: Gantz
desc: After their deaths, two teens are transported to an apartment with an ominous black sphere and must participate in a gory alien-hunting "game."

title: Rent-a-Girlfriend
desc: After being dumped by his girlfriend, a college student enlists a dating service to "rent" a girlfriend who, unbeknownst to him, happens to be both a fellow student and his neighbor.

title: Charlotte
desc: The story takes place in an alternate reality where a small percentage of children manifest superhuman abilities upon reaching puberty. A focus is placed on Yuu Otosaka, a high school boy who awakens the ability to temporarily possess others, which brings him to the attention of Nao Tomori, the student council president of a school founded as a haven for children with such abilities.

title: Terminator Zero
desc: 2022: A future war has raged for decades between the few human survivors and an endless army of machines. 1997: The AI known as Skynet gained self-awareness and began its war against humanity.

title: Tower of God
desc: Reach the top, and everything will be yours. At the top of the tower exists everything in this world, and all of it can be yours.

title: Wolf's Rain
desc: In a post-apocalyptic future where humans live in domed cities surrounded by wasteland, wolves are assumed to be two hundred years extinct.

title: Welcome to the N.H.K.
desc: This surreal dramedy follows Satou Tatsuhiro as he attempts to escape the evil machinations of the NHK.

title: The God of High School
desc: A tournament takes place to determine the best fighter among all high school students in Korea.

title: The Apothecary Diaries
desc: A young maiden is kidnapped and sold into servitude at the emperor's palace, where she secretly employs her pharmacist skills with the help of the head eunuch to unravel medical mysteries in the inner court.

title: Prison School
desc: Hachimitsu Academy, once an all-girls school, has become co-ed, and teen Kiyoshi is one of five boys to enroll. When he is caught peeping, Kiyoshi is sent to the schools prison, where his punishment is carried out.

title: Durarara!!
desc: Tired of his mundane life, Mikado Ryugamine decides to move to Ikebukuro, a district in Tokyo, when a friend invites him. Ikebukuro is full of connected mysteries where people's pasts intertwine with the present.

title: Heavenly Delusion
desc: A boy grows up behind the safe walls of an apocalyptic Japan full of monsters. Tokyo flourishes as a paradise, while outside the walls of hell dangers lurk. However, a small group searches for heaven.

title: Slam Dunk
desc: About Sakuragi Hanamichi, a freshman of Shohoku High School who joins the basketball team because of the girl he has a crush on, Haruko. Although he is newbie in this sport, he is no ordinary basketball player.

title: The Eminence in Shadow
desc: When Cid is isekai'd to another world, he creates an underground organization to live out a fight against a made-up cult. Little does he know the cult is real, and they're not happy his power fantasy just impeded their plans.

title: Kengan Ashura
desc: Kazuo Yamashita is an ordinary fifty-six year old man who one day is summoned by the chairman of his company and hired as a manager of a gladiator. He learns that these hired gladiators engage in battles called "Kengan Matches" to protect the corporate rights of the businesses they represent. Kazuo Yamashita is assigned to manage a mysterious Kengan fighter named Ohma Tokita. Both men join the "Kengan Zetsumei Tournament" with the hope of winning the spot as chairman of the Kengan Organization.

title: The Quintessential Quintuplets
desc: With his family deep in debt, Futaro Uesugi accepts a lucrative job tutoring underachieving quintuplet classmates to help them graduate high school.

title: Golden Boy
desc: A University drop-out rides Japan on his bicycle, taking part-time jobs and trying not to take women.

title: Captain Tsubasa
desc: Tsubasa Oozora is an 11-year-old elementary school student who is deeply in love with football and dreams of one day winning the FIFA World Cup for Japan.

title: Aggretsuko
desc: Frustrated with her thankless office job, the 25-year-old red panda copes with her daily struggles by belting out heavy metal karaoke after work.

title: Delicious in Dungeon
desc: Can sisters be reincarnated from dragon poop? Laios and his friends Marcille and Chilchuck delve into an endless dungeon in search of his fallen sister, fighting monsters, starvation, and corruption.

title: Seraph of the End
desc: In 2012, the world allegedly comes to an end at the hands of a human-made virus, ravaging the global populace and leaving only children untouched. It is at this time that vampires emerge from the recesses of the earth.

title: Ajin
desc: A high school student discovers he is an Ajin, a demi-human being. He ends up a fugitive on the run because of his powers.

title: Ninja Kamui
desc: Former ninja Joe Higan is ambushed by assassins who seek bloody revenge on him and his family for their betrayal, after escaping his clan and fleeing into rural America.

title: Beyblade
desc: Four Beybladers and their genius friend travel the world as team 'Bladebreakers' to win a championship, realizing there's much more at stake on the go.

title: Great Pretender
desc: A Japanese conman crosses paths with a French rival, and gets entangled in conspiracies and scams beyond his wildest dreams.

title: ReLIFE
desc: A young man, failing at life, is offered a new start as a 10 years younger high-school student.

title: Bakemonogatari
desc: Third-year high school student Koyomi Araragi is human again. Cured of his vampirism, he seeks to help other supernaturals with their problems. Koyomi becomes involved in their lives, revealing secrets in people he once knew.

title: Summer Time Rendering
desc: Due to the death of his childhood friend, Shinpei returns to his native home, but beneath the surface this island seems to hold some secrets.

title: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress
desc: A large group of survivors seek shelter while travelling on a train after their station was attacked by aggressive, undead creatures called Kabane.

title: When They Cry
desc: The story of a group of young friends and the mysterious events that occur in the rural village of Hinamizawa.

title: Fate/stay night
desc: Amateur mage Shirou Emiya gets involved in a fight between mages using mythological heroes.

title: Blue Spring Ride
desc: Revolves around Futaba, a girl who was in love with a boy named Ko Tanaka in middle school. However, it did not work because he transferred but in high school, her world is turned around once again when she meets him again.

title: Shaman King
desc: SHAMAN KING follows the adventures of a 13-year-old shaman and his teammate a samurai warrior spirit, who traverse the world fighting evil spirits and misguided shamans on their journey to be the next Shaman King.

title: Nana
desc: Two ostensibly opposite women, both named Nana, become roommates in Tokyo and grow inseparable. However, their relationship is jeopardized as the harsh realities of adult life take shape.

title: Hyouka
desc: Hyouka centers on Oreki Hotarou and his life in the Classic Literature Club. His mundane world is flipped upside down as they begin to solve various mysteries.

title: Yasuke
desc: He came from Africa and fought alongside a mighty feudal lord in brutal 16th century Japan. They called him the Black Samurai, and he became a legend.

title: The Way of the Househusband
desc: A retired gangster spends his time as a househusband carrying out home chores.

title: Odd Taxi
desc: In a city which should be familiar, there is the feeling of something a little different.

title: Heidi: A Girl of the Alps
desc: This animation series follows the childhood "adventures" of a girl named Heidi, who lives with her grandfather somewhere on the Alps.

title: Kimi ni Todoke: From Me to You
desc: Sawako wishes to make friends but her weird vibe and lack of communication skills are getting in her way. Fortunately, it's no longer the case since she met Kazehaya, an extroverted guy who she couldn't help but to fall in love with.

title: Full Metal Panic!
desc: Sousuke Sagara, a member of a covert anti-terrorist private military organization known as Mithril, tasked with protecting Kaname Chidori, a spirited Japanese high school girl.

title: Battle Angel
desc: In a distant future, a the young cyborg Gally is found on a scrapheap by the Cyberdoctor Daisuke Ido, who rebuilds her and becomes her surrogate father.

title: Vampire Knight
desc: Yuki Cross, along with her best friend Zero, attempts to keep the peace between humans and vampires at Cross Academy, but personal issues soon threaten the situation.

title: 91 Days
desc: The story takes place in Lawless, a town thriving on black market sales of illicitly brewed liquor. Avilio returns to Lawless after some time away, following the murder of his family in a mafia dispute there.

title: Ranma ½
desc: A girl is involuntarily engaged to a boy who turns female when hit with cold water and male when hit with hot.

title: Guilty Crown
desc: After the outbreak of the unidentified virus "Lost Christmas" in 2029, Japan has been under the control of a multi-nation organization called GHQ. Ohma Shu is a 17 year old boy who has a psychic power in his right hand. He can use the power "Ability of King" to extract tools or weapons from his friends. He has been avoiding making trouble for others but his life changes when he meets a girl Yuzuriha Inori, a member of a resistance guerrilla group called "Funeral Parlor", whose members pilot mecha weapons to fight against the government.

title: Sonic X
desc: A slight malfunction causes Chaos Control, and sends Sonic the Hedgehog to Earth. While there, Sonic meets Chris Thorndyke, who aids at collecting the Chaos Emeralds, so Sonic and friends can go home.

title: Cardcaptor Sakura
desc: Sakura stumbled upon the book of Clow Cards in a library. Accidentally setting the magical cards loose, it's now up to Sakura to catch them all with her best friend Tomoyo, and Kerberos, the guardian of the cards.

title: Devil May Cry: The Animated Series
desc: Dante, a superhuman son of a powerful murdered demon and human woman is a master of gun and sword who runs an "odd-job" agency. Despite financial troubles, he never loses his cool since work always comes calling sooner or later.

title: B: The Beginning
desc: In this anime series, scientists hope "new humans" will create universal peace, but they're kidnapped by an evil group with very different plans.

title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy
desc: Tired of endless war, Demon King Anos decides to be reincarnated into a peaceful future. Enrolling in school, he doesn't get the welcome he hoped for.

title: Redo of Healer
desc: Keyaru is a healing magician who is abused repeatedly by others. Using his healing magic, he goes back four years into the past to get revenge on the ones who abused him.

title: Kite
desc: A young girl, orphaned at an early age, carries out assassinations at the behest of her mentor.

title: Inuyashiki
desc: A middle-aged office worker encounters aliens and is gifted with alien technology and limitless powers.

title: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid
desc: Office worker Kobayashi's boring life changes after she drunkenly saves a dragon. To pay her back, Tohru takes human form and becomes her maid.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
desc: A semi-spinoff of the popular Yu-Gi-Oh anime series, focusing on a boy named Jaden and his misadventures as a student at an esteemed Duel Monsters academy.

title: Gungrave
desc: Brandon, a passive man, lives a laid-back life until his friends are murdered. He joins the mafia to be near Maria, the woman he loves, enduring hardships but willing to risk everything to be with her.

title: Kamisama Kiss
desc: Nanami is left homeless after her father runs away due to debts. When she saves a man named Mikage from dogs, he gives her his house which turns out to be a shrine and she becomes the new deity.

title: The Pet Girl of Sakurasou
desc: Sorata is a normal student living in an abnormal dorm and he wants desperately to escape. But his plans are put on hold when a new student moves in. Attentions stray and sanity frays as the housebreaking continues in Pet Girl of Sakurasou.

title: My Happy Marriage
desc: An unhappy young woman from an abusive family is married off to a fearsome and chilly army commander. But the two learn more about each other, love may have a chance.

title: Bocchi the Rock!
desc: Hitori "Bocchi-chan" Gotoh is a lonely high school girl whose heart lies in her guitar. One day, she meets Nijika Ijichi and joins 'Kessoku Band'. After that, her daily life starts to change little by little.

title: Doraemon
desc: Doraemon is a robotic cat that comes from the 22nd century. He comes to 20th century and stays with Nobi Family. The Nobis love Doraemon very much. So Doraemon always help the Nobis with the devices from 22nd century.

title: Yona of the Dawn
desc: After being betrayed and run out of her home, the red-haired Princess Yona searches for four legendary dragons to take back her stolen kingdom.

title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
desc: Various people, especially two rising commanders, cope with a massive continual space conflict between two interstellar nations.

title: Given
desc: Ritsuka was ready to give up on music until he met Mafuyu Satou; now Mafuyu is taking guitar lessons from Ritsuka, who, after hearing Mafuyu's strikingly beautiful voice, hopes to make him the lead singer of his band.

title: Tonari no kaibutsu-kun
desc: Shizuku, a hardworking student who isn't interested in socializing, finds an unlikely friend, Haru, an emotionally volatile boy at her school.

title: Spice and Wolf
desc: Kraft Lawrence goes from town to town to make profits as a travelling merchant, with the help of a wolf deity by the name of Holo.

title: Tekken: Bloodline
desc: Follow Jin Kazama and his fight to become one of the best fighters in the King of the Iron Fist tournament.

title: Love, Chunibyo & Other Delusions
desc: Yuuta suffered from "chuunibyou" while he was in middle school. When he graduated, he try to forgot about it but he accidentally got into a contract with Rikka and disrupts his desperately ordinary life.

title: Future Boy Conan
desc: Long after a devastating war almost destroyed the entire world, a boy with superhuman strength fights to save his friends from those who seek to conquer what is left of civilization.

title: The Tatami Galaxy
desc: When a nameless student at Kyoto University encounters a demigod one night, he asks to relive the past three years in order to win the heart of Ms. Akashi, the object of his affection.

title: Ping Pong the Animation
desc: Five ping pong prodigies learn to navigate the harsh climate of competitive sport and the even more frightening realm of self realization.

title: Don't Toy with Me, Miss Nagatoro
desc: High schooler Hayase Nagatoro loves to spend her free time doing one thing, and that is to bully her Senpai. After Nagatoro and her friends stumble upon the aspiring artist's drawings, they find enjoyment in mercilessly bullying the timid Senpai.

title: SK8 the Infinity
desc: High school sophomore and hardcore skater Reki introduces transfer student Langa to a secret, no-holds-barred race down an abandoned mine.

title: Golden Time
desc: With freshmen law students Banri and Mitsuo, it's friendship at first sight. But trouble gets stirred up with talk of a fiancé.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam Wing
desc: A squadron of giant robot pilots of a beleaguered Earth colony bring the war to their oppressive home planet.

title: Log Horizon
desc: 30,000 Japanese players trapped in MMORPG, unable to log out. Veteran gamer Shiroe leads exploration of this new reality, negotiating with NPCs to bring order to the virtual city of Akihabara.

title: Blood+
desc: In present day Okinawa, a young amnesiac girl named Saya combats vicious, shape-shifting vampires. Her adoptive family and friends help her track down their source and uncover her past.

title: TONIKAWA: Over the Moon for You
desc: A Young Prodigy accepts a Sudden Proposal from a Mysterious Woman who he falls in love with after she saves him from a Near-Death Experience.

title: Btooom!
desc: A young man gets transported into a video game he plays called Btooom. A plot is uncovered involving an organization that aims to conquer the world by dominating the virtual world.

title: Magi: The Labyrinth of Magic
desc: Aladdin, Alibaba, and Morgiana go their separate ways after spending time together in Sindria to develop their own strengths, make new friends and prepare for what is coming.

title: How NOT to Summon a Demon Lord
desc: An elite player is summoned by two maidens to save a fantasy game.

title: Orange
desc: High school student Naho Takamiya receives a letter from her future self that warns her to avoid mistakes she will make involving a new transfer student, Kakeru Naruse, a troubled boy whom she meets and begins to fall in love with.

title: Baki Hanma
desc: To gain the skills he needs to surpass his powerful father, Baki enters Arizona State Prison to take on the notorious inmate known as Mr. Unchained.

title: Wotakoi: Love is Hard for Otaku
desc: A gaming otaku and a fujoshi reunite for the first time since middle school at work.

title: Moomin
desc: The eerie and charming animated adventures of a creature called Moomin and his friends and family.

title: Chivalry of a Failed Knight
desc: Ikki Kurogane struggles as the worst Blazer, only able to materialize his soul into a weak weapon. His dreams of becoming a Magical Knight are shattered when he meets Princess Stella Vermillion, altering his life's path.

title: Chobits
desc: Hideki finds the discarded and malfunctioning Persocom Chi, a personal computer that looks like a girl. While trying to fix and care for Chi, Hideki discovers that she might be a Chobits, a robot of urban legend that has free will.

title: Space Dandy
desc: The cosmic and comic adventures of Space Dandy, a handsome space explorer tasked to tour the universe and discover new alien beings.

title: K-On!
desc: K-ON is about 5 high school girls who become friends through the Light Music Club. Yui the lead guitarist, Tsumugi the keyboardist, Mio the bassist, Azusa the rhythm guitarist, and Ritsu the drummer. K-ON is the story of 5 aspiring musicians and their journey through high school together.

title: Knights of Sidonia
desc: A thousand years after the destruction of Earth by gigantic aliens called Gauna, mankind is living on massive spaceships. One of these space ships is Sidonia, which is protected by large pilot controlled exosuits called Gardes.

title: D.Gray-man
desc: Young Allen Walker, an exorcist, fights Akuma to save the world.

title: Maya
desc: The story of a young bee named Maya and her adventures.

title: Domestic Girlfriend
desc: The daily life of high-school student Natsuo is heavily complicated after his single father marries the mother of his teacher crush Hina Tachibana and her sister Rui - who he had shared his first experience with with at a preceding mixer.

title: Dandadan
desc: When Momo and Okarun's beliefs clash, they're thrown into a world of ghosts, aliens and awakened powers.

title: Uzumaki
desc: The population of Kurouzu is slowly driven mad by their growing obsessions with spiral shapes, finding them everywhere with shocking and horrifying results.

title: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
desc: Hajime Nagumo and his high-school classmates are suddenly summoned to a fantastical land as heroes.

title: Grand Blue Dreaming
desc: A college student spends his year at the seaside town of Izu, having fun on the beach with his school friends.

title: Kotaro Lives Alone
desc: A lonely little boy moves into a ramshackle apartment building all on his own and makes friends with the broke manga artist who lives next door.

title: The Vision of Escaflowne
desc: Girl with psychic powers transported to magical Gaea. She and friends face attack by evil Zaibach empire. Guymelf Escaflowne holds the key.

title: Saga of Tanya the Evil
desc: A girl with blond hair, blue eyes, and porcelain skin fights on the front lines of a brutal war and climbs the ranks of the imperial army.

title: Basilisk: The Kouga Ninja Scrolls
desc: In 1614, two rival ninja clans back opposing sons of Hidetada Tokugawa for the shogunate. They send their finest warriors to battle to the death, with the victor's clan ruling for a millennium.

title: Samurai 7
desc: A small village gets raided by bandits every harvest season. The villagers can't take it anymore, and decide to recruit samurais to defend them in exchange for rice. Will the villagers find who would defend them from the bandits?

title: High-Rise Invasion
desc: High schooler Yuri finds herself atop a skyscraper in a strange world, where she must survive against masked assailants bent on killing their prey.

title: Barakamon
desc: A proud young calligrapher is punished for punching a critic by being sent to a faraway island in the east coast of Japan. But as he meets and lives with the island's friendly people, his attitude begins to improve.
